sourcesContent:
Your Cart is Empty.
  • Total {{ cartTotal | currency:'$' }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; //import { MessengerService } from 'src/app/services/messenger.service' import { Product } from 'src/app/models/product'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.css'] }) export class CartComponent implements OnInit { cartItems = [ ]; cartTotal = 0 constructor() { } ngOnInit() { this.cartTotal = 0 this.cartItems.forEach(item => { this.cartTotal += (item.qty * item.price) }) } }
